scenario_text.value:
Having trouble moving with those injuries!
Ahaha! Serves you right!

You know, you really shouldn’t be fighting in
your shape. Might hurt yourself, hahaha!
What is it, human? You want to die?

Stay back! You’ll never stand a chance
against one of us!

No, you’re too important to me. I have to do
this!

What’s this nonsense? Anyone in my way will
be destroyed!
